channel.title: I want to uninstall kicksecure.
channel.description: I installed kicksecure on KVM, but I want to uninstall it completely including the configuration file because I messed with the settings too much, so please tell me how to do that.

item.title: I want to uninstall kicksecure.
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
In Virtual Machine Manager, rt click on the Kicksecure entry then select Delete. Check the storage image if not selected. Then confirm Delete once more.

Read full topic
